G4785.def: to be counted as belonging to a particular group

G3326.def: a marker of an associative relation, usually with the implication of being in the company of{N:001}

G1733.def: cardinal number, where there are eleven instances of a countable entity

G652.def: one who fulfills the role of being a special messenger (generally restricted to the immediate followers of Jesus Christ, but also extended, as in the case of Paul, to other early Christians active in proclaiming the message of the gospel)
